column5: Been looking forward to this weekend for quite awhile after canceling twice, first trip to the big pond and you couldn't have asked for better weather. Matter of fact it may have been a little too nice for the walleye, but the fish still co-operated. We didn't fish as much as we normally would because of all the work to do with getting my buddy's boat in the water and doing some maintenance on his place. Fished for about 6 hours Saturday two of us boated a dozen and Sunday 3 hours three of us boated 15, not going to tell ya who the big stick was cause I don't want to jinx myself     . Took our 4 fish limit both days, fish were all pretty much the same size 17-21 inches. All of our fish came from 4 to 8 foot of water and all but three were caught on hair jigs tipped with minnows, the other three came from pulling crankbaits over the same reef. Only managed to take a few pics, the first is a pic of my buddy's boat after we got it in the water.  A few fish pics    Sunset on Saturday night    Had a great weekend  Whopper
NO MONSTERS BUT STILL A BEAUTY REPORT BRO!!! TX FOR SHARIN
Great report Phil.  I'm surprised you got them in that shallow of water.  Are you holding that pickerel by the top lip?  Ouch.  Love the sunset shots.  Joey
I was noticing what Joey said too, man you must have tough skin on your fingers to lip a wally! WTG on the outing.

LOL Joey, no lipping walter I was holding the jig that was still stuck to the top of the mouth, just so happens that two of those fish went back, a lot of times I will not stick my fingers under the gill plate if I know that they are not going into the cooler
Excellent report, I can't wait to start walleye fishing myself!
great report I can't wait to get into a few walleye
Way to go.  That was Spring Training.  Get ready to start the regular season.
LOL Phil, I think I have fished around that dock! The water shots look like all of Erie, except calmer that normal. Nice job! You look better holding fesh!
Super Report buddy, Wish I was out there with you guys.. mummmmm Walleye
thanks for sharing phil. looks like yuo had good time!
Good stuff, can't wait to get into'em up here...
beauty Phil!
Great stuff Phil!  Congrats on a successful outing....and those sunrise pics are great.  dk
Great report Phil!  Wish walleye were open here on Lake O!!  Nice looking fish and great pics of your boat and sunset.
two weeks here come on hurry up what a tease phil nice fish awesome report...
Nice fish Phil. Glad to see the weekend went well.
Way to go Phil.  I remember your buddies's boat from a post from last year. Hopefully, a good sign for a great season.  Bring some of that luck to Lakair!
Nice report Phil, couldn't of asked for a nicer weekend, maybe if there was a little more wind and clouds the big girls might have came out.
Nice fish... 4 fish limit? 6 is the limit on erie this year, but good eats none the less.
Nice looking eyes and doen't sound like too bad of a week-end.  Love those sunset pics

Corey, the State of Ohio has a four fish limit until May 1st then it changes to six for the remainder of the year. Their little way of helping the spawn, they also just dropped the perch limit midstream from 40 to 30 which was fine with me.   Thanks all for the kind words!  Whopper
Great pics and report Bubba!!! 'Bout time you got out after them Wall-ice!
Nice catch guys...looks like the weather was great too.  ..and you guys did real well,thats some respectfull numbers too.thanks for sharing,love the pics too....cheers
